SEARCH
Package co.kr.bluebird.sled

Interface ISledBarcodeController

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractReader, BTReader, Reader
public interface ISledBarcodeController
Interface definition for sled barcode controller(Uses only in models that attached a barcode H/W on Bluebird android device.)

    • SB_SetBarcodeTriggerMode

      int SB_SetBarcodeTriggerMode(int SBBarcodeTriggerMode)
      Sets bar code scan mode
      Parameters:
      SBBarcodeTriggerMode -
      SDConsts.SBBarcodeTriggerMode.LEVEL = 0(default)
      SDConsts.SBBarcodeTriggerMode.PULSE = 1
      SDConsts.SBBarcodeTriggerMode.EDGE = 2
      SDConsts.SBBarcodeTriggerMode.AUTOSTAND = 3
      Returns:
      Execution result value.(The detailed values are described in the implementation section.)

    • SB_SetBarcodePresetValue

      int SB_SetBarcodePresetValue(int SBPresetType, String presetData)
      Sets the preset(prefix, suffix, preamble, postamble) Data
      Parameters:
      SBPresetType -
      SDConsts.SBPresetType.PREFIX = 0,
      SDConsts.SBPresetType.SUFFIX = 1,
      SDConsts.SBPresetType.PREAMBLE = 2,
      SDConsts.SBPresetType.POSTAMBLE = 3
      presetData - Preset data(Max Length : SDConsts.SB_PRESET_VALUE_MAX_LENGTH)
      Returns:
      Execution result value.(The detailed values are described in the implementation section.)
